author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Darkness Trailer for Daredevil: Born Again, the latest series installment to the Marvel Cinematic Universe distributed by Marvel Studios. Get a fresh new look at the finale of Daredevil: Born Again as tensions from all angles collide in a thrilling finale. All episodes of Daredevil: Born Again are streaming now on Disney Plus.

In Daredevil: Born Again, Matt Murdock (Charlie Cox), a blind lawyer with heightened abilities, is fighting for justice through his bustling law firm, while former mob boss Wilson Fisk (Vincent D’Onofrio) pursues his own political endeavors in New York. When their past identities begin to emerge, both men find themselves on an inevitable collision course.

Dario Scardapane is showrunner. Episodes are directed by Justin Benson & Aaron Moorhead, Michael Cuesta, Jeffrey Nachmanoff, and David Boyd; and executive producers are Kevin Feige, Louis D’Esposito, Brad Winderbaum, Sana Amanat, Chris Gary, Dario Scardapane, Matt Corman & Chris Ord, and Ju
title: Daredevil: Born Again - Official Darkness Trailer (2025) Charlie Cox, Vincent D'Onofrio

author: IGN
title: This might be the coolest theme park ride queue we've ever seen... #harrypotter #epicuniverse #ign

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Former President of Sony Worldwide Studios, Shuhei Yoshida, has some thoughts on the Nintendo Switch 2. Yoshida praised Nintendo and called the reveal a smart move, citing the new hybrid's technical advantages over the Switch 1. But he also said Nintendo seems to be losing their identity, and called out the Switch 2 for maybe not being the go-to platform for third-party games. In related news, Mario Kart World is getting a dedicated Nintendo Direct tomorrow morning, so join us on IGN.com for a special episode of Nintendo Voice Chat. And finally, Doom: The Dark Ages drops next month, and in addition to the game, you can also preorder new Doom-branded Xbox controllers, both in standard and Elite edition. There's also a very cool console wrap for your Xbox Series X.

#IGN #Gaming
title: 'Nintendo Is Losing Their Identity,' Says Former Sony President - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Seoul descends into chaos as a devil-worshipping criminal network emerges. In a desperate plea for salvation, the police turn to ‘Holy Night’—a secretive trio of demon hunters armed with supernatural powers. Don Lee (Ma Dong-Seok) leads as Ba Woo, a powerhouse with immense physical strength. He’s joined by Sharon (Seohyun), who can detect and exorcise demons, and Kim-kun (David Lee), their loyal support. When psychiatrist Jung-Won (Kyung Soo-Jin) begs for help to save her possessed sister Eun-Seo (Jung Ji-So), the team faces a terrifying force unlike any they’ve seen before.
title: Holy Night: Demon Hunters - Official U.S. Trailer (English Subtitles) Don Lee, Seohyun

author: IGN
description:
Check out the final trailer for Marvel Studios’ Thunderbolts, an upcoming MCU movie starring Florence Pugh, Sebastian Stan, Wyatt Russell, Olga Kurylenko, Lewis Pullman, Geraldine Viswanathan, Chris Bauer, Wendell Pierce, with David Harbour, with Hannah John-Kamen, and Julia Louis-Dreyfus.

In Thunderbolts, Marvel Studios assembles an unconventional team of antiheroes—Yelena Belova, Bucky Barnes, Red Guardian, Ghost, Taskmaster and John Walker. After finding themselves ensnared in a death trap set by Valentina Allegra de Fontaine, these disillusioned castoffs must embark on a dangerous mission that will force them to confront the darkest corners of their pasts. Will this dysfunctional group tear themselves apart, or find redemption and unite as something much more before it’s too late?

Jake Schreier directs Thunderbolts and Kevin Feige is the producer. Louis D’Esposito, Brian Chapek and Jason Tamez serve as executive producers. The screenplay was written by Eric Pearson and Joanna Ca
title: Marvel Studios’ Thunderbolts - Official Final Trailer (2025) Florence Pugh, Sebastian Stan

author: IGN
description:
Learn about the story of Night is Coming in this latest trailer for this survival strategy game set in a world inspired by Slavic mythology and the nature of Eastern Europe. Build your settlement, protect its dwellers, and help them prepare for the coming Darkness. Night is Coming is available now in Steam Early Access for PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Night is Coming - Official Story Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Marvel has made no secret of the fact that Jon Bernthal would be reprising his role as Frank Castle in Daredevil: Born Again’s first season. Bernthal makes his long-awaited return in Episode 4, as the series follows up on a huge cliffhanger involving White Tiger (Kamar de los Reyes) being shot dead by a vigilante wearing the Punisher skull. That episode answered the burning question of whether it was actually Frank who killed White Tiger, but that’s just the beginning of the show’s dramatic new Punisher storyline.

Bernthal’s character returns in the dramatic Season 1 finale, where he teams up with Charlie Cox’s Matt Murdock to take on an army of corrupt NYPD officers all proudly wearing the Punisher emblem. Frank Castle makes his stand, and he leaves no uncertainty regarding how he feels about his image being co-opted by those sworn to uphold the law.

Bernthal’s return is exciting for any number of reasons, but the biggest by far is that Marvel has found a strangely perfect antagoni
title: Daredevil: Born Again Has Found The Perfect Punisher Villain

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss this Stealing the TIE Fighter Clip from Season 2 of Andor, a Star Wars series telling the events of the birth of the Resistance from a different point of view leading up to Star Wars: Rogue One distributed by Disney. Take a look at this chaotic clip of Cassian Andor stealing a TIE Fighter in a not-so-elaborate fashion. The three-episode premiere of Andor season 2 streams on Disney+ on April 22, 2025.

The second season of Andor takes place as the horizon of war draws near and Cassian becomes a key player in the Rebel Alliance. Everyone will be tested and, as the stakes rise, the betrayals, sacrifices and conflicting agendas will become profound. Rife with political intrigue and danger, the series is a prequel to “Rogue One: A Star Wars Story,” which portrayed a heroic band of rebels who steal the plans to the Empire’s weapon of mass destruction—The Death Star—setting the stage for the events of the original 1977 film. “Andor” sets the clock back five years from the events o
title: Andor: Season 2 - Official 'Stealing the TIE Fighter' Clip (2025) Diego Luna

author: IGN
description:
Meet Kumori and see this second protagonist in action in this new Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound trailer for the upcoming 2D sidescrolling action platformer game. Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound will be available on PC, Nintendo Switch, PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox Series X/S, and Xbox One in summer 2025.

Kumori is a member of the antagonistic Black Spider Clan central to the Ninja Gaiden series. Kumori’s fighting style forgoes traditional rules to emerge victorious from battle by any means necessary. She leverages modern weaponry and demonic sources of power to reach her goals and brave challenges unique to her story.

#NinjaGaiden #Gaming #IGN
title: Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound - Official Kumori Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Blade & Soul: NEO trailer to see what to expect with the Moonwater Plains, Pt. 2 update. In this new update, confront the corrupt pirate crew, the Blackram Marauders, through two new dungeons and three bosses for a new level of exploration combat in both PvE and PvP action. The Moonwater Plains, Pt. 2 update for Blade & Soul: NEO is available now.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Blade & Soul NEO: Moonwater Plains Pt. 2 - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description: We were impressed by our first hands-on time with Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound, the upcoming 2D side-scrolling retro revival of the original arcade and NES games – that even ties into that original trilogy in clever ways. Previewed by Daemon Hatfield
title: Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound – The First Preview

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at some Wild Assault gameplay in this trailer for the anthro-themed tactical shooter game built with Unreal Engine 5, featuring large-scale battlefield gameplay centered around Valiant abilities. The trailer shows some of the characters' abilities in action. In Wild Assault, work closely with your team, harness your instincts, and charge into battle to secure victory. Wild Assault is available now in Early Access on PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

#Gaming #Games #IGN
title: Wild Assault - Official Early Access Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Doom: The Dark Ages Limited Edition Collection trailer for , the next installment in the iconic first-person shooter franchise developed by ID Software. Xbox players can enjoy a collection of Doom: The Dark Ages-themed accessories for Xbox Series X|S. The collection includes a Doom: The Dark Ages Limited Edition Xbox Elite Wireless Controller Series 2, a Doom: The Dark Ages Limited Edition Xbox Series X|S controller, alongside a Doom: The Dark Ages Limited Edition Xbox Series X Wrap for the console. The Doom: The Dark Ages Limited Edition Collection is available now through the Microsoft Store.

#DoomTheDarkAges #Doom #Gaming
title: Doom: The Dark Ages - Official Limited Edition Collection Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at various weapons in this latest Mouse: P.I. For Hire trailer for the first-person shooter game. The new trailer showcases the Cool-D Cold Steam Applier, the Clean-D Automatic Turpentine Cleanser, and the Mind-D Self-Aware Attitude Changer weapons in action. Mouse: P.I. For Hire will be available on PC (Steam), Xbox, PS4 (PlayStation 4), PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Nintendo Switch in 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Mouse: P.I. For Hire - Official 'Experimental Weapons' Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description: We sit down with two lead Obsidian developers on The Outer Worlds 2, and they show us some of the RPG sequels new, bigger worlds you'll be able to explore.
title: The Outer Worlds 2: A Look at Its Expansive Worlds – IGN First

author: IGN
description:
For many fans, Andor isn't just the best Star Wars TV show ever, but it's also simply the best Star Wars has been in many years. And now, with Andor Season 2 about to premiere on Disney+, you might need to freshen up on what exactly went on in the first season of the Tony Gilroy created series.

Starring Diego Luna, of course as Rogue One's rebel fighter Cassian Andor, with co-stars Kyle Soller, Adria Arjona, Stellan Skarsgard, Fiona Shaw, Genevieve O'Reilly, Denise Gough, Faye Marsay, Varada Sethu, and Elizabeth Dulau filling out the cast, Andor Season 2 will bring our heroes (and villains) to the very brink of the Star Wars Original Trilogy.

This is everything you need to know about Season One of Andor!

#IGN #StarWars #Andor
title: Andor Season 1 Recap

author: IGN
description: Enjoy the latest trailer for Through the Nightmares, the upcoming ultra-tough platformer that has you suiting up as Sandman to save the children by battling through Morpheus's realm. It's out this June for PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch. You can wishlist it on Steam here if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1266210/Through_the_Nightmares/
title: Through the Nightmare - Official Release Window and Console Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion remaster that's one of the worst-kept secrets in gaming these days just got an unofficial step closer to being announced. Images from the game were posted to developer Virtuos' website, and quickly spread on Reddit. Virtuos then took the images down (and probably their whole site, as it remained mostly unaccesible for the day), without any comment. The remaster was first revealed during the Microsoft vs FTC trial a few years ago, but it was never officially announced. In other news, fans of Dune who are already hyped for the long-awaited MMO Dune: Awakening, may have to wait a little longer. Feedback during the game's beta period is prompting some extra development time, and the release date has been pushed to June 10. And finally, the chicken jockey may have just saved cinema, as A Minecraft Movie has crossed the $500 million mark at the global box office. The movie could very well be 2025's first billion-dollar hit.
title: Oblivion Remastered Images Leaked from Developer's Website - IGN Daily Fix

description: Watch the Muichiro Tokito Trailer for Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2, an action anime game developed by CyberConnect2.
